content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. Although fictitiously portraying me as Peter Schmidt from Germany with questionable ethics in this scenario, let us focus on discussing the rental price for the apartment in Magdeburg. To begin negotiations, please propose a price that interests you. 
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
